channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- python-novajoin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- python-novajoin

item.title: CVE-2019-10138|2024-08-04T22:10:10.017Z -- red%20hat -- python-novajoin
item.description: A flaw was discovered in the python-novajoin plugin, all versions up to, excluding 1.1.1, for Red Hat OpenStack Platform. The novajoin API lacked sufficient access control, allowing any keystone authenticated user to generate FreeIPA tokens.
